org.waarp.gateway.kernel.rest

Class DataModelRestMethodHandler<E extends org.waarp.common.database.data.AbstractDbData>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waarp.gateway.kernel.rest.RestMethodHandler
      • org.waarp.gateway.kernel.rest.DataModelRestMethodHandler<E>

  • public abstract class DataModelRestMethodHandler<E extends org.waarp.common.database.data.AbstractDbData>
extends RestMethodHandler
    Generic Rest Model handler for Data model (CRUD access to a database table)
    Author:
    "Frederic Bregier"

                                                                            throws HttpIncorrectRequestException,
                                                                                   HttpInvalidAuthenticationException,
                                                                                   HttpNotFoundRequestException
        For Read or Update, should include a select() from the database. Shall not be used for Create. JSON_ID should be checked for the primary id.

        arguments -
        result -
        body -
        Returns:
        the Object E according to URI and other arguments
